mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CART WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND productId = #{productId}

SELECT c.memberId, c.productId, c.quantity, c.createdAt, p.id AS "product.id", p.name AS "product.name", p.description AS "product.description", p.price AS "product.price", p.stock AS "product.stock", p.createdAt AS "product.createdAt" FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.productId = p.id WHERE c.memberId = #{memberId}
